hedline.hl1: MEDICAL ASSURANCE IS SET TO ADD PROFESSIONALS GROUP

abstract.p: Medical Assurance Inc will purchase Professionals Group Inc for $232 million plus debt; this creates third-largest US medical malpractice insurer (S)

block.p: Medical Assurance Inc. said yesterday that it had agreed to buy the Professionals Group Inc. for $232 million plus debt, creating the nation's third-largest medical malpractice insurance provider. Professionals Group stockholders will receive $12 cash and $14 in stock of the new holding company or $26 in cash for each of their shares, a 62.5 percent premium over Thursday's closing price. Medical Assurance shareholders will exchange their shares one-for-one. Stock in Professionals Group, which is based in Okemos, Mich., jumped $6.859, to $22.859. Medical Assurance is based in Birmingham, Ala.
